content.text:
# Dunfermline Central (ward)

| alt1     = Location of the ward
}}Dunfermline Central is one of the 22 wards used to elect members of the Fife council. It elects four Councillors.

Election results
2022 election
2019 by-election
In September 2019 Dunfermline Central Conservative Cllr Alan Craig resigned his seat. A by-election was held on 14 November 2019 and Derek Glen gained the seat for the SNP.
Fife Council|access-date=2019-10-31|archive-date=2019-10-31|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20191031224944/https://www.fife.gov.uk/kb/docs/articles/council-and-democracy/elections2/dunfermline-central-and-rosyth-by-elections|url-status=live }}
